title: The closing of the shop
description: To the memory of JFF and his acerbic wisdom On a late morning in January 2007, I visited Jean-François Fogel at what then were the offices of Lemonde.fr in Paris. He showed me around and then went for lunch. We had first met at the tenth anniversary of Clarin.com a few years prior, where the...
